zhcn_desc: §E§H食物§!（£food£）表示了维持£pop£§H人口§!增长的各种必要营养物质。以下方式可获得更多食物：\n§Y1.§!在已殖民的星球上建造§H农业区划§!。\n§Y2.§!在§H市场§!进行购买。§!
en_desc: §E§HFood§! (£food£) represents the various nutrients required to sustain and grow £pop£ §HPops§!. You can gain more by:\n§Y1.§! Building §HAgriculture Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.\n§Y2.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!
